'''King's College International School Bangkok, shortened to KCIS, or rarely, KCISB''', is an international school located in the Yan Nawa District, Bangkok, Thailand.
Affiliations
King's College International School Bangkok is owned by the [https://th.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%92%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%8C%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%AE%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%87 Saha Group], who partnered with King's College School to build the school.
Education
The King's College education system ranges from the Early Years Foundation Stage to Year 13. It also has IGCSE and A-Level qualifications. The tuition fees in KCIS in the academic year of 2025 to 2026 have ranged from 616,000 to 1.06 million baht.
History
King's College International School Bangkok opened in September 2020, becoming the first King's College school to be opened outside of Britain.
